articles.description: 1983 World Cup-winning team captain Kapil Dev has reserved big praise for Shubman Gill, who finished as the leading run-getter in the recently concluded Asia Cup 2023. According to the legendary all-rounder, the 24-year-old Gill is the future of Indian cricke…
articles.content: Meet Dunith Wellalage! The Sri Lanka Spinner Who Dismissed Gill, Kohli, Rohit, Rahul, Hardik VS India

articles.author: Simon Patterson
articles.title: Headaches and doubts swirl going into MotoGP's first Indian GP - The Race
articles.description: Circuit concerns, logistical worries and even reports of snakes all add up to a fraught run in to MotoGP’s inaugural Indian Grand Prix this weekend
articles.content:
This weekend MotoGP heads to the Buddh International Circuit outside New Delhi for its first ever Indian Grand Prix.
Yet in the days leading up to MotoGP track action commencing at the former Formul… [+3416 chars]
